website_summaries.verdict: A great choice for consumers who prefer a basic, one-wheel design wheelbarrow at an affordable price.
pros: A traditional wheelbarrow at an affordable price
Offers a smooth roll with rugged pneumatic tire
An ideal model for gardening, but is also rugged enough for hauling rocks, soil, and more
cons: Not quite as durable as the WORX or the Marathon

customer_reviews.title: Seems a little cheap
customer_reviews.text: I got this because it was advertised to be more on the rugged side but I'm doubtful at how long it will really last. The plastic is see through and not what I expected for $40. My picture shows the actual product which is different from the Amazon sales listing. Wish I bought a different one or had my money back.
customer_reviews.author: KSB

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandson and it has totally faded and now the plastic is cracking and falling apart. It was very expensive and the quality is poor. It only lasted about a year. Next time I will purchase a real wheelbarrow in a small size from the hardware store.
customer_reviews.author: Cara Weston

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous product for small children!
customer_reviews.text: 1. Poorly designed due to sharp edges all the way around the top. Small children could fall across the top & get seriously hurt! Cannot see the edges in the picture shown on the internet. 2. I paid for a NEW wheelbarrow! I was sent a beat-up, dirty box with a small box inside that had been opened & left ripped open with no tape on it. I finally found the plastic bag which had also been left ripped open with numerous small parts. There was no parts list to check it out. Too much trouble - turned off to the whole mess!!!!
customer_reviews.author: SUNNY

customer_reviews.title: The best of a thin lot.
customer_reviews.text: My 3 and 5 year old boys love it. Assembly was easy enough, however, washers would go a long way in not stressing holes where bolts and such pass through and nuts are torqued down. The wood handles are unfinished, a little rough, nut not enough to create splinters. I wish there were something slightly larger. I wish the bin had slightly thicker plastic. Kids like to drop rocks and stuff in it to help Dad and Mom. Kid wheel barrows are hard to find, this one fits the bill well enough.
customer_reviews.author: KCCjr

customer_reviews.title: Plastic breaks down quickly
customer_reviews.text: Plastic tub is extremely vulnerable to UV radiation and had broken to pieces within 6 months of purchase. We took all the hardware and put it on a 30 year old wheelbarrow tub from my husband’s childhood and we’re happy. This product could use improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah T.

customer_reviews.title: Grandson is thrilled!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this wheelbarrow for my 4 year old grandson who loves hauling things from here to there with Daddy and working in the garden with Mommy. It is bigger an roomier than some others. The handles attach easily and are moderately sturdy. It's made of plastic so it is what it is. Perfect for a 4-year old.
customer_reviews.author: Jackieg

customer_reviews.title: Someone really loves this.
customer_reviews.text: My 2 yo loves this. He helped Nana haul produce from the garden, hauling garden treats to the goats and hauling other things that should have stayed put. It is also used in-house to rearrange the decor.
customer_reviews.author: Auntie Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Useful!
customer_reviews.text: I like real stuff in miniature for my kid. I think she should be able to enjoy real work, and real function with ergonomics suitable for a small human. This little wheelbarrow fits the bill perfectly. Well made, very sturdy construction, with real ash handles and a tough rubber tire. The bucket is a nice thick plastic in a cheerful cherry color. Very well balanced, and easy for her to handle with two metal struts to rest upon. Even though she is very young (not yet 2), she can pick up the wheelbarrow and run it around. Easy to assemble, in about 1/2 hour using minor tools.
customer_reviews.author: M. Podolec

customer_reviews.title: So worth your money!!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure what everyone is complaining about. It's perfect for my 1 year old no complaints. Is it expensive for the quality?...yes but I looked around before purchasing this and it's the best bang for your buck. It's built for small children it's not a full sized adult wheelbarrow. Also the more heavy duty you make it the heavier it becomes and then the kids can't use it...my only complaint is the handles seem like they might cause splinters but not a big deal I'll just wrap them and problem solved! If I knew how to add a picture I would😊
customer_reviews.author: Ashtyn

customer_reviews.title: Grandson loves it.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my grandsons 5th birthday. He loves it and it's just the right size for him. One thing I do recommend though is to replace all the supplied hardware with 1/4-20 pan head screws and nuts with nylon locking inserts. That way if the screws work loose during play they can not come apart and become choking hazards for younger brothers or sisters.
customer_reviews.author: Mark G.

customer_reviews.title: Not as expected.
customer_reviews.text: I had no idea I was buying a children’s item. It just didn’t occur to me that this could have been something to look out for. Item description does say “children” as one of the last words in a lengthy title. Annoyed. Money wasted.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Toddler sized wheelbarrow
customer_reviews.text: Our 20 month old loves scooping shovels of dirt into his wheelbarrow alongside mom and dad. Pushing it is a bit advanced for his development, but we know he’ll figure out the balance before he outgrows this functional learning toy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Toys that are useful and lasting
customer_reviews.text: Our grandson wanted a wheelbarrow like Mimi’s for his 3rd birthday. He was delighted to receive this sturdy wheelbarrow that will be useful and last for years. The supplier, Lehman’s, was kind to send a dear email when I ordered. I particularly ordered that one because Lehman’s products have always been dependable and well constructed.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this wheelbarrow for our average-height 5 year old and it was a great purchase. The wheelbarrow is sturdy and very well-made. We did not want something that looked or worked like a cheap toy, and this wheelbarrow definitely was a good decision. He has been using it to move lots of wood and sticks around the yard and it is great - perfect size and very easy to maneuver. He loved his gift and we are very happy we bought it.
customer_reviews.author: MG

customer_reviews.title: Wheel rubs but it's nice
customer_reviews.text: Wheel sits too close to barrow so adjustments had to be made. Grandson did love it though.
customer_reviews.author: Debra S

customer_reviews.title: awesome wheelbarrow at first...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 3 yr old grandson. It is a bit heavy for him to use fully, and I thought he would be using this to help Dad garden for years to come. However after 2 months, the wheelbarrow has faded to pink . I don't recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Dreena

customer_reviews.title: Grandson Was Thrilled
customer_reviews.text: After looking all over town unsuccessfully for a toy wheelbarrow for my grandson, I ordered this one. He was thrilled with it. In fact, so much so, that his mother had to hide it until it was warm enough to take it outside. Now he pushes it all over the yard, helping his dad with the gardening. I don't live near them, but so far haven't heard any complaints about its durability, and I know it's getting a workout!
customer_reviews.author: Dee Dee Chumley Okie Reader

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and durable
customer_reviews.text: I think the wood handles should be sanded and maybe put a coating to avoid splinters. Otherwise it was perfect!!!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: we love being in the backyard though
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old kid loves this, we love being in the backyard though!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Working Wheelbarrow
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 3 year old grandson who loves to 'work' out in the yard. This thing is so sturdy, it actually carries quite a load without being wobbly or unstable in any way. It has far exceeded our expectations....and his.
customer_reviews.author: A. Murphree

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This wheelbarrow was a gift for my 3 year old grandson. It is sturdy but lightweight so he can easily manage it, but it holds lots of treasures & work materials and he loves it!! An excellent purchase! He feels quite important being able to toil alongsdie his Daddy & we are confident it is safe. Well balanced & easy to maneuver. Assembly was easy as well. We love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wheelbarrow
customer_reviews.text: This wheelbarrow is the perfect size for a child. Our granddaughter is three and will be able to enjoy this for 2 to 3 years. perfect size for little hands and plenty of room to haul whatever she would like. The quality is also very good, Was extremly pleased. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Maria A. Levers

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: More than a toy, can be used to move dirt and mulch . My grandson loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Jim O.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My grandson (5 yrs) LOVES this. It's just his size
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer L. Doely

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect. Very sturdy. My nephews 2yr and 4 yr love them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great kids size
customer_reviews.text: Great kids size. Bought 2 of these and my boys love them. They really enjoy helping out Dad or Grandpa with them. Takes only a few minutes to assemble and built rat her well.
customer_reviews.author: Lcl511

customer_reviews.title: Summer fun with grandkids.
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived in timely fashion and was packaged well. Wheelbarrow was not difficult to put together by grandpa. Grandkids enjoyed having their own wheelbarrow just like grandpa. Wheelbarrow is well constructed and sturdy for kids to use.
customer_reviews.author: sunshine and company

customer_reviews.title: excellent
customer_reviews.text: I got this 2 years ago for my daughter who was 4 and we still use it quite often. It is durable and just the right size for her even still at 6, sometimes my 10 year old uses it for yard work/play. Particularly great is the tire is not hollow plastic and has lasted, and the barrell is hard plastic but has not cracked or shown signs of wear.The color is a bit faded and the wood is starting to show wear but nothing a clear coat won't take care of. This product has definetly shown it's worth for the price.
customer_reviews.author: jenn

customer_reviews.title: The boys love them and haul items all over the yard
customer_reviews.text: Gave as a birthday present. The boys love them and haul items all over the yard.
customer_reviews.author: Suz R

customer_reviews.title: The only thing is it faded to pink within a month but other than that it works great!!
customer_reviews.text: This is just the right size for my 4 and 2 year old. The only thing is it faded to pink within a month but other than that it works great!!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: The wheel feels like real rubber
customer_reviews.text: The wheel feels like real rubber. The inside of the wheel barrow looks deeper in the picture. It is still nice. It wasn't hard to put together. The handles are made of real wood. Nice!
customer_reviews.author: To Know...

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size - mini me!
customer_reviews.text: Very well made. Plastic tray is good because it is light so even my 2 year old granddaughter can manage it.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely excellent. Very well made, great for thphe price. My daughter will actually be able to use this for gardening long after my grandson is done with it.
customer_reviews.author: MCM

customer_reviews.title: Our 4 year Grandson LOVES it!!
customer_reviews.text: This was a birthday present for our grandson. He loves to work in the gardens with his mom and helps bring wood to the wood rack using this wheelbarrow. It is well made and perfect size for him. The color does fade if left outside was the only draw back.
customer_reviews.author: J. Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Delighted with the quality of this product. We have not had much of a chance to use it outside yet, but it seems like a sturdy product and should hold up to some heavy-duty gardening with our grandson. We purchased for him for Easter and he loves it! Used it to find all 65 eggs hidden in the yard.
customer_reviews.author: PatB

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly. Easy to assemble. Bought for my 3 year old grandson. He loves it. Perfect size for him. Loads his toys and travels throughout house. I am sure it will be even more fun for him when spring comes and he can use it outdoors.
customer_reviews.author: nancy

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Great for my 4 year old to push around in the yard
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Coker

customer_reviews.title: Item returned. The parts did not fit right together ...
customer_reviews.text: Item returned. The parts did not fit right together. Could not assemble it.
customer_reviews.author: ANNETTE

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality
customer_reviews.text: The kid's wheelbarrow was better than expected quality. Plan to add a few flat washers to protect the plastic tub. It takes about 30 minutes to properly assemble. I would recommend to a friend. My boys will love it.
customer_reviews.author: SLK

customer_reviews.title: Use the instructions
customer_reviews.text: Kids just helping mom and dad around with yard work but they mean serious business no problems with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Helping buyers

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and weight
customer_reviews.text: My 3year old grandson can handle it easily and loves helping his Daddy (my son) on their 13 acre farm
customer_reviews.author: Cecelia Rosengrant

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great quality and perfect height for our 5 years olds
customer_reviews.author: Twincess Mom

customer_reviews.title: This was a great gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my sister's grandson. They were thrilled with the quality and construction. My sister is sure this will be handed down to many other children as their families grow.
customer_reviews.author: Southern lady

customer_reviews.title: good size but funny smell?
customer_reviews.text: Better size than the others I looked at; 4-yr old son loves it. I was glad I put it together a couple weeks ahead of time to have time for it to air out. When it came it had a funny smell.
customer_reviews.author: Cody C Platt

customer_reviews.title: Durable and Cute
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old LOVES this. She feels part of the gardening process - plus it's surprisingly durable!
customer_reviews.author: Adams

customer_reviews.title: INCREDIBLE
customer_reviews.text: This is great for my son! I'm sure he'll be using it for several years. It was a little too big for him at 3 years old, but he managed just fine with it.
customer_reviews.author: Mommy of one almost-perfect boy

customer_reviews.title: Grand Children
customer_reviews.text: Sent as a gift and never saw item, rating is best guess based on no bad feed back from daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Gray wolf

customer_reviews.title: Boys love wheels
customer_reviews.text: It could have been the 4 year olds only gift and he would have been satisfied. A great hit and in constant use.
customer_reviews.author: Alta B.Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Great wheelbarrow - poor packaging
customer_reviews.text: I received my wheelbarrow almost a week past the expected arrival date - that was fine. BUT, when it got here, the box had lost it's lid! Luckily all the parts were accounted for, but the weather (rain, snow, sleet) had gotten in and all was damp. It is an outdoor wheelbarrow - so I simply put it together and use it.
customer_reviews.author: Joselyn N Whetzel

customer_reviews.title: We were very happy with the purchase but it can't be used yet ...
customer_reviews.text: We were very happy with the purchase but it can't be used yet due to the fact that the handles weren't included. My grandson can't wait to work in the yard with his wheelbarrow. Please make Sweet Angel Julien The Grandson Shine Happy. Thank You
customer_reviews.author: Ann Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: great purchase
customer_reviews.text: This was a great buy for my son! He is 2 and loves it!! Worth every penny!! I would recommend this for anyone who has a child or grandchild that enjoys the outdoors!
customer_reviews.author: hkelly

customer_reviews.title: Happy, happy, happy!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this wheel barrow for my 3 year old granddaughter. She loves it, she just got her first horse and she's learning to muck stalls already. Great product, great service!
customer_reviews.author: laurelbatzion

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this ...much better value than a Radio Flyer..very durable for a busy 4 year old
customer_reviews.author: Linda Mackanesi

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for the young gardner
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my grandson. He loves it! I plan to purchase another one as a gift for another grandson. It is cute and well made. The only negative is that the color has faded somewhat.
customer_reviews.author: Pthomp5

customer_reviews.title: Lousy
customer_reviews.text: Arrived missing parts. I don't want a refund I want the parts. This was a gift for a two year old.
customer_reviews.author: BillH

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy little wheelbarrow
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item for my 6 & 8 yr old grandsons. They use it to haul dirt that they dig and dump in various locations. It is sturdy and is just the right size for them to carry out all of the heavy duty work they deem necessary for a day's fun. It was easy to assemble and will provide hours of outdoor imaginative play for these two active boys. I would recommend this little wheelbarrow.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Stiffler

customer_reviews.title: Appears to be fairly sturdy and is just the right size for a 5 year old.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this a a gift for a 5 year old. It is just the right size and he and his younger brother love to help Dad in the yard.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Lamb

customer_reviews.title: Great for our 2 year old
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our 2 year old for his birthday. He had some difficulty using it initially but now after a couple months he is getting the hang of it. This way when we are doing yard work with our big wheel barrow he can use his little wheel barrow and he seems to really like it. It was easy to assemble and seems pretty solid.
customer_reviews.author: Ysan Reischke

customer_reviews.title: Great wheelbarrow
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this wheelbarrow for our 3 yr old son for Easter. It was to replace his smaller plastic one. We couldn't be happier with it, and neither could he... The assembly was super easy, and it is a perfect size for a "big boy", who likes to work in the yard with mom and Dad.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer horner

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together, lightweight but durable! Perfect for my 4-year old nephew!
customer_reviews.author: Dana Bustos

customer_reviews.title: excellent wheelbarrow
customer_reviews.text: 4-year old son loved the upgrade from his toddler wheel barrow. This one fits more stuff & is of good construction.
customer_reviews.author: Kirby

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought for 6 year old. He has move a lot of dirt and large rocks. Very sturdy
customer_reviews.author: L. M. Valdez

customer_reviews.title: tough, just right
customer_reviews.text: excellent for the little kid who wants to help in gardens and yard work. they love it. very easy to put together
customer_reviews.author: billy jackson

customer_reviews.title: Wheelbarrow
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old son is really enjoying pushing around the wheelbarrow around the house. It just the perfect size.
customer_reviews.author: K.G.

customer_reviews.title: Nice product otherwise
customer_reviews.text: Fades to pink if you leave it outside.Nice product otherwise!
customer_reviews.author: FatRat

customer_reviews.title: This is a hard-working little boy's dream "toy"!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my 3 year old grandson to push around and load up with important things! He absolutely loves it. Very durable.
customer_reviews.author: janet brolund

customer_reviews.title: Good quality!
customer_reviews.text: Birthday gift for our 4 year old grandson. He loves it! Good quality!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Great for 3 year old
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size. Will last for years. My granddaughter loves it. Would recommend this fir child helping with yard work. Sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Linny

customer_reviews.title: Great product for kids
customer_reviews.text: My grand kids love this item (2 and 4). Also it is very sturdy and I'm sure it will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: GregK

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great little wheelbarrow. Nice size and will actually carry some things.
customer_reviews.author: Vickie R.

customer_reviews.title: Well Made
customer_reviews.text: My grandson (2 years) loves this wheelbarrow. It is very sturdy and has already provided hours of entertainment picking up rocks and sticks in his yard.
customer_reviews.author: Susan J. Bialasik

customer_reviews.title: We are very happy with our purchase
customer_reviews.text: We are very happy with our purchase. Very solid material. We bought it for our 3 year old grandson and it is perfect for him now and as he grows. Packaging was shoddy but all parts were included and no damage to product.
customer_reviews.author: Brigitte

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: My two year old son likes this; but it will require some growing into. It's probably a bit large for a two year old. Well built; and looks just like Dad's version.
customer_reviews.author: Boys' Mom

customer_reviews.title: The "hit" of his birthday party!!!
customer_reviews.text: Our five year old grandson loved his wheelbarrow! He immediately began wheeling it around the backyard, along with the long-handled children's sized garden tool set and he was as happy as can be, ready to "get to work"! The wheelbarrow is very well built and sturdy. He finds it very easy maneuver. Nice rubber tire, which appears to be rugged and long-lasting.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce

customer_reviews.title: I got a wheel
customer_reviews.text: It may have been a great gift for my 2yr. old son, but I only received the wheel and 5 metal pieces, along with a small bag of screws, bolts.
customer_reviews.author: Jaclyn Miller

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy construction, not shallow like some others, lightweight plastic, my kid loves it!
customer_reviews.author: RitaMeeta

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Our grandson loves this wheelbarrow. At 2, he can handle it well and it should bring fun for years to come. Went together easily.
customer_reviews.author: John W. Kuech

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my 5 yr olds
customer_reviews.text: This wheel barrow was perfect size for my 5 year old twins. Very easy to put together and very sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Summertheis

customer_reviews.title: Great tool for kids
customer_reviews.text: Awesome for children! Now my grandson can help Grandma in the barn with the horses! Good quality for the price. But the people I bought it from was slow on shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Scott

customer_reviews.title: For my 3 year old
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old would follow my mother in law around her yard. We found one similar to this one at a garden store and he pushed it around the store until we left. Bought this one and he loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Nokes

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with gift.
customer_reviews.text: Loved it! Handy for all ages. Made very well. Don't hesitate to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: carol kramers

customer_reviews.title: Definitly the right one for a 4 year old boy.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my four year old grandson, so he could work with his dad. The other make like Radio Flyer, John Deere are to small for a growning four year old. This one however is the right size and it went together easy. It will definitly be hable to handle what a four year old can dish out. Now if it were just made in America.
customer_reviews.author: J. Mazor

customer_reviews.title: great wheel barrow
customer_reviews.text: We loved it and the grandkids did too. It was very sturdy we will see in the months ahead if it's tough enough for 2 boys
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Nunley

customer_reviews.title: GREAT ITEM - not just another toy
customer_reviews.text: This item is WELL-made. Sturdy. Functional AND larger capacity than is typical. Good for actual WORK by the child >:-]]
customer_reviews.author: Keith D Slocum

customer_reviews.title: even your daughter will play with this
customer_reviews.text: My six year old daughter loves this. She been wanting this for her birthday. It's very solid. Very happy with this.
customer_reviews.author: elkgrovemommy

customer_reviews.title: awesome birthday gift
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the wheelbarrow for my 3 year old grandson for his birthday. It is perfect for him to haul things and we can even haul him! The size is better than the competition brand which is metal but smaller. It should be perfect for him to be a farmer until he can handle an adult sized one. He loves it!
customer_reviews.author: C. Harrington

customer_reviews.title: Fairly Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: The wheelbarrow was exactly like we were expecting. The packaging was horrible. It was in a very cheap box which arrived with rips and the wheelbarrow handles were sticking out. Was not happy about that. The wheelbarrow itself was easy to assemble and seems to be good quality. The handles could be a little bigger as they seem a little chinsy for the wheelbarrow themselves. Otherwise we are satisfied with it.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Quality toy at a good price
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, sturdy, and easy to assemble. It is The perfect size for years to come for my 5 year old.
customer_reviews.author: MARY OHORO

customer_reviews.title: sturdy and great size
customer_reviews.text: Our 5 year old has logged miles with this already, included hauling concrete scraps that were dumped into the wheelbarrow with decent force. It's holding up well and a great size for him (kind of short) and he has plenty of growing room to still use it comfortably for several more years.
customer_reviews.author: lovetoread

customer_reviews.title: Loved It!!
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what I was looking for! It was a gift for my 5 yr. old granddaughter & it was perfect. It is sturdy and also the right size. The only concern is the packaging wasn't the best. The box was not sturdy & if I was planning on giving it in the box, which I didn't, I would have had to find another box because the one it came in was all tore up.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy but it fades if kept outdoors
customer_reviews.text: This is very study and heavy duty. Perfect for my tall 4 year old but I'm very disappointed how quick this fades. I got it for him for christmas and 3 months outdoors and it's almost white. Should have got the metal radio flyer wheel barrow instead. What a let down.
customer_reviews.author: Gaby

customer_reviews.title: Nice wheelbarrow
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice wheelbarrow. Perfect size for my three year old grandson. The wooden handles on the one I got were very rough, so my husband took steel wool and sanded them down and gave them a few coats of clear paint. Now they are perfect. All in all a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia

customer_reviews.title: Mislead
customer_reviews.text: A toy is amongst the regular wheelbarrows, return fell flat on it's face, don't deal with this seller.
customer_reviews.author: The Truth/Real buyer

customer_reviews.title: very cute!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 4 year old. Its great. Very well made and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Molnar

customer_reviews.title: New Favorite Toy for 3-Year Old
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 3 year old granddaughter and she just loves it. She's currently using it to help move the raked leaves from the back yard!
customer_reviews.author: Maine Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Nice wheelbarrow. My daughter really enjoys digging up dirt and putting it in the wheelbarrow. The wheelbarrow is light weight and very durable. Easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Adams

customer_reviews.title: Wheelbarrow Packed in Toilet Paper Box!
customer_reviews.text: This wheelbarrow arrived in my front door in a toilet paper box! And the side of the wheelbarrow was sticking out of the box since the box was too small for it! I bought this wheelbarrow as a gift for my son's 5th birthday. How am I going to present it as a gift in this kind of packaging? Mind you, I bought this item new, not used. Shouldn't it at least have its original packaging??? All I can say is that I am very disappointed...
